title: Agent Chandler, Retired: A Short Thriller
description: Agent Chandler wakes up in an abandoned building, on a bloody mattress, with a several day gap in his memory. It's a pretty routine do a job, get drugged, wake up in a shady place. Except, this time, they've altered his face, which can only mean one he's been retired. In his line of work, things are a little more complicated than a 401K withdrawal.AGENT CHANDLER, RETIRED is an action-packed spy thriller that is sure to keep you guessing until the end.
author: Jennifer Arnett
